meanings.definition: Having been in existence for a long time
meanings.sent1: The old bookstore is an established part of the community.
meanings.sent2: The established tradition of family dinners brings everyone together.
meanings.sent3: The established rule of no running in the library was broken by a mischievous squirrel.
meanings.sent4: Her established routine of morning yoga helped her stay centered throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: The established oak tree in the park provided shade for generations of picnickers.

meanings.sent1: They established a new rule for the game to make it more exciting.
meanings.sent2: The pioneers established a settlement in the uncharted wilderness.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to establish a secret club in the old treehouse.
meanings.sent4: She hoped to establish a strong bond with her new puppy through training.
meanings.sent5: The artist worked hard to establish her unique style in the art world.

meanings.definition: To prove or show to be true
meanings.sent1: The evidence presented in court established his innocence beyond doubt.
meanings.sent2: Her hard work and dedication established her as a reliable employee.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick failed to establish the existence of real magic.
meanings.sent4: The scientist's groundbreaking research established a new understanding of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The historical documents helped establish the truth about the ancient civilization.
